scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Karen
scrape.text: I hated every character in this book. I hated that half the book drones on about the restaurant, the food, the brother, and other stuff I just didn't care about. I'm the end it avoids a one star review only because the second half has enough of a plot to get you to the end, as long as you skip full paragraphs as you go.
